0.ahk: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
0.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

4.ahk: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
4.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

5.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020

7.eng: Translator Sai Rong, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap

11.eng: Khoek taix ka sidah khoek tiaix. (a) Khoek taix tix kah rawm sidah khoek taix pa yuh ka rawm plai teung.

12.eng: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
12.wbm: Paw teeh ngai, meeh mai jheeh tix.

13.eng: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.
13.wbm: Phan miah, mauk caw ti tawb meeh mai jheeh ka joh tix (a) caw ti tawb ka plah ce. Khaix an caw ti tik daux pung briem dom mawx dom an heue.

14.eng: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.
14.wbm: Caw ti ot singai khaing paox tix dee iak (6) sawk awx.

15.eng:
Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
15.wbm: Phan ang nyawm ot, caw ti ot nyiex. Phan mauk, nu ti sileed bhawm mai phan koe jhawm saux caw ti niied hu nyiex sidah pa dex mai tix heue.

16.eng: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
16.wbm: Caw ti jhak sitang pa shiang mai Covid – 19. Caw ti hawt yuh awm sitang mai pa tawx daux krax cub caw pa shiang mai krax nyawm ot awx.

bookText.ahk:
Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း



 Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
bookText.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020
Literacy for Women in Africa
Translator Sai Rong, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap



Khoek taix ka sidah khoek tiaix. (a) Khoek taix tix kah rawm sidah khoek taix pa yuh ka rawm plai teung.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.



Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.


Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.


Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
bookText.mya:
Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း




Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
bookText.uuu:
Via khaing Covid - 19




Via khaing Covid - 19
bookText.wbm:
Via khaing Covid - 19



Via khaing Covid - 19







Paw teeh ngai, meeh mai jheeh tix.
Phan miah, mauk caw ti tawb meeh mai jheeh ka joh tix (a) caw ti tawb ka plah ce. Khaix an caw ti tik daux pung briem dom mawx dom an heue.
Caw ti ot singai khaing paox tix dee iak (6) sawk awx.
Phan ang nyawm ot, caw ti ot nyiex. Phan mauk, nu ti sileed bhawm mai phan koe jhawm saux caw ti niied hu nyiex sidah pa dex mai tix heue.
Caw ti jhak sitang pa shiang mai Covid – 19. Caw ti hawt yuh awm sitang mai pa tawx daux krax cub caw pa shiang mai krax nyawm ot awx.

title: Via khaing Covid - 19
